column1: Nekk isem-iw Tom. Massa Fisher d weltma.
Nekk xedmeɣ aked Massa Marie Fisher.
Icebbayi rebbi wagi d amdakel n massa Schmitt.
Waqil wagi d amdakel n massa Schmitt.
Ur tesɛam ara niyya deg ulawen
column2: ɣurwen tayri d urar anda tettkellixem yal-ass.

column1: Yiwen lekdeb ad inaɣ laman nni fayeg ɣef kra medden tebna tayri.
Akka tura d yiwet seg tilawin icebḥen di lpari marra.

column2: ḥemlaɣ tameṭṭut i-y-iɣelben s setta iseggasen.

column1: Ad yewwet udeffel deg uzgen n ddurt id iteddun.
Ad yuɣal udeffel di tazwara d ddurt id iteddun.
Anda yella Tom ? - Atan deg uxxam.
Sami ur yezmir ara ad ibeggen aya.
Sami teɣlid fella-s teddarɣelt d tiɛẓegt.
Ur semḥas ara yark iwayen id yeqqar.
Sami yuker tiɣawsiwin seg uxxam n Layla.
Sami yennak ɣef laǧal-is i yemmut vava-s
Sami ur iwala ara yark Layla tettru.
Sami ur-d iru y-ara yark di lǧanaza.
Izmer d Sami i yenɣan Layla
Sami d timenɣiwt i yenɣa iman-is.
Sami ur yumin ara Layla mazal tedder.
Sami d Farid llan akken di lḥebs.
Tzemreḍ ad taruḍ s tutlayt ik yehwan. Di Tatoeba
